transcript: you can become proficient in any skill in about 20 hours the problem is is that people will wait a decade to start the first hour you'd be amazed at how much progress you can make if you cut down the time between when you acknowledge the work and when you start doing the work and I think that over time in my career what has happened is just that my delay between when I need to do something and when I start doing it has just shrunk so that I can get to the gain and proficiency that much faster and then if you think about that over 10 years 20 hours and 20 hours and 20 hours and 20 hours and 20 hours and 20 hours by the end of that decade they're not even recognizable
